alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 12:35PM EST until February 16 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Area roads that are experiencing flooding will be slow to improve early this afternoon. * WHERE...A portion of western Kentucky, including the following counties, Daviess, Hopkins, McLean, Muhlenberg and Webster. * WHEN...Until 230 PM CST. * IMPACTS...It will take several hours for all the water from the earlier storms to recede off both urban and rural roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1130 AM CST, Scattered showers will still be possible this afternoon, with additional rainfall amounts of a half inch or less. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Owensboro, Madisonville, Calhoun, Sebree, Livermore, Dixon, Whitesville, Beech Grove, Masonville, Hanson, Sacramento, Island, Slaughters, Bremen, South Carrollton and Moseleyville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
